oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sir Edward Michael Pakenham portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Major General the Honorable Sir Edward Michael Pakenham (1778-1815). Portrait from a print in the collection of Mr. Clarence S. Bement, Phila. Shoulder portrait of Pakenham in military uniform.
Pakenham was the hero of the Battle of Salamanca (1812) Ordered by Wellington to attack the French, his troops assured the British victory. He was killed in the Battle of New Orleans (1815).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pakenham, Edward Michael, 1778-1815
Pakenham, Edward Michael, 1778-1815;New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Southern States--History--War of 1812
